sect2.title: Dépendances d'installation de Libtool
sect2.para: Dernière vérification effectuée auprès de la version &libtool-depversion;.
sect2.literallayout: Bash: sh Binutils: ar, as, ld, nm, ranlib, strip Diffutils: cmp Fileutils: chmod, cp, install, ln, ls, mkdir, mv, rm, rmdir Gcc: cc, cc1, collect2, cpp0 Glibc: ldconfig Grep: egrep, fgrep, grep Make: make Sed: sed Sh-utils: echo, expr, hostname, sleep, uname Texinfo: install-info Textutils: cat, sort, tr, uniq
